thread.title: Go-to perfume of four Love Island All Stars girls 'gets compliments all the time' and is on sale
thread.title_full: Go-to perfume of four Love Island All Stars girls 'gets compliments all the time' and is on sale

title: Go-to perfume of four Love Island All Stars girls 'gets compliments all the time' and is on sale
text:
The Love Island All Stars villa is full of glamorous women, and it seems that many of them share a love for one perfume in particular - and you can currently buy it on sale The excitement for season two of Love Island All Stars is undeniable as viewers get to see some cherished faces grace their screens once again. There's a burning question on fans' lips, though: what's the secret behind the islanders' alluring scents?
For those looking to channel their inner ITV icon, we've got the hot goss on the fragrance that four girls can't get enough of this series – and it's up for grabs at a bargain.
READ MORE: Save nearly £90 this winter on Cat Deeley's cosy cashmere sweater from This Morning appearance
READ MORE: Frankie Bridge is 'obsessed' with her leopard print coat that 'looks really expensive'
(Image: Debenhams)
Boots, Love Island's official partner, has disclosed that Libre Flowers and Flames by YSL is the aroma turning heads in the villa. Touted as "radiant and feminine," Catherine, India, Gabby, and Olivia declared it their "go-to" perfume.
You, too, can spritz on this sumptuous "sensual" EDP, which usually retails for £72 at Boots. But here's a little insider tip – Debenhams is currently offering it at a…
